name: Broomstick Delivery
description:
A side scrolling 8-directional time trial game. Get an item and complete the level as fast as you can for maximum profits. Take too long and you will end up paying the customer. Dodge or shoot your way through enemies. The choice is yours.

Featuring music by Matthew Pablo with contributions by Joth and Kevin MacLeod

Requires keyboard and mouse and Chrome browser to play.

Please leave a useful comment about what you thought or if you had problems. The game is still in alpha.
